overview: Eike Klindworth (24) is Co-Founder and Managing Director of InnoGames. He focuses on graphics and gamedesign. He entered the Browsergame sphere in 2003, still as a pupil, when he created the game Tribal Wars together with his brother Hendrik Klindworth and his school friend Michael Zillmer. Today, Tribal Wars is one of the most successful Browsergames ever, with 33 million users from more than 200 countries. Creating the first playable version only took them one month of programming. InnoGames was in 2007 founded as a consequence of this huge success. Eike Klindworth studied graphical gamedesign in Magdeburg, Germany.
